Donna Fontenot's got a fun little flash movie that we can all kick back and enjoy on our Friday lunch breaks. It's even got that nice, mellow '70s XXX-film soundtrack playing in the background and a few clever stereotypes mixed in with some naughty, suggestive romance. Check out Friday Fun at SEO-Scoop.
